description: Red and yellow capsicums loaded with a savoury Mexican-inspired filling make a perfect meat-free dinner option. They're hearty, filling and delicious.
name: Mexican Bean-stuffed Capsicums Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Macro Organic tri colour quinoa, rinsed
5ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a baking dish with baking paper. Cook quinoa in a saucepan over boiling water for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Spray onion with oil. Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat.

Add onion and garlic. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until onion softens. Add cumin, mustard and chilli powder. Cook, stirring, for 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add chickpeas, tomato, spinach, quinoa and half the cheese. Cook for 1 minute or until spinach wilts. Remove from heat.
Cut tops from capsicums, reserving tops. Scoop out seeds. Fill with quinoa mixture. Top with remaining cheese. Place in prepared dish, with reserved tops.
Spray with oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until capsicums are tender and the cheese melts. Serve with salad.
